title: Discover Tropical North Queensland at the Five-Star Pullman Cairns International
description: Make the five-star Pullman Cairns International your launchpad for an adventure in Tropical North Queensland. Offering a fantastic location in the heart of Cairns and stunning views over Trinity Inlet, your escape includes an automatic upgrade to a sought-after Harbour View room. Enjoy AU$150 food and beverage credit to spend at Coco’s Kitchen + Bar, famous for its seafood buffet, high tea and cocktails. Your package also includes a fantastic daily full buffet breakfast with DIY juice bar, welcome bottle of sparkling wine, complimentary Wi-Fi and a leisurely 12 noon late checkout.

title: Tropical North Queensland Paradise
description: Explore the gateway to the Great Barrier Reef with a relaxing stay in Tropical North Queensland staying at the Pacific Hotel Cairns, located in the heart of town directly opposite Trinity Inlet and the abundance of casual beachside cafes, bars and restaurants that line the Esplanade. Enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one Brazilian barbecue dinner, welcome bottle of Champagne and more.

title: Pullman Five-Star Cairns Escape with Daily Breakfast & Drinks & A$100 Dining Credit
description:
Savour unrivalled water views with a five-star stay at Cairns prestigious Pullman Reef Hotel Casino. With the harbour in front and the genuine magic of the Great Barrier Reef easily accessible, Pullman Reef is a true Cairns landmark - its distinctive glass dome houses the Cairns Zoom & Wildlife Dome, and The Reef Hotel Casino, home to Blackjack and Roulette tables with world-class restaurants hidden within.

Your tropical escape includes daily breakfast, a daily drink per adult, A$100 food credit at the award-winning Tamarind restaurant, Cairns only chef-hatted restaurant by the Australian Good Food & Travel Guide, daily self-parking for one car and guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

**This offer has no surcharges:** travel when it suits you, for the same incredible price.

**Travelling with family?** Up to one child (aged 12 years and under) stays free with daily breakfast.

title: Pullman Cairns International Tour Combo Mar 21
description: xxxx

title: Five-Star Pullman Cairns Luxury with A$150 Dining Credit & Harbour Views
description:
A sun-dappled deck, bobbing yachts in the harbour, mountain vistas and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef on the doorstep… it's easy to appreciate the beauty of Tropical North Queensland from the five-star Pullman Cairns International. Understated luxury at its finest within the heart of Cairns, this waterfront oasis is located steps from the Cruise Liner Terminal - your gateway to one of the most magnificent coral cays in the world - and a short walk to the vibrant Esplanade, bursting with waterside bars, trendy boutiques, vivacious entertainment and seafood galore.

Brought to you by the iconic Accor Group and currently ranked within Tripadvisor's top 10 hotels in Cairns, Pullman Cairns International is curated for tropical relaxation with a swimming pool, a fully-refurbished spa and fitness centre, and one of Cairns' best seafood restaurants - Coco's Kitchen + Bar. Experience everything this glamorous seaside destination has to offer with this five-star hotel as your launchpad.

title: Five-Star Shangri-La Cairns Stay with A$100 Dining Credit & Daily Cocktails
description:
For breathtaking ocean views and a privileged position on Cairns Marina - just minutes' walk from the Esplanade - stay in five-star Shangri-La luxury at the iconic Shangri-La Hotel, The Marina, Cairns. Perched on the glistening waterfront, this resort-style hotel invites you to set sail on a cruise of the spectacular UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef, check out Cairns' top attractions and join one of the many exciting Queensland tours to Kuranda, Daintree Rainforest and beyond.

Make the most of this magical destination with daily breakfast, A$100 food and drink credit per room towards onsite bar and restaurant, one daily seasonal-inspired cocktail per adult, complimentary daily parking and Wi-Fi throughout your stay, and your choice of early 10am check-in or late 2pm checkout.

**Travelling with family?** Check out the family upgrades for up to two adults and three children (aged 11 years and under). Children eat free with a paying adult.
offer_address: Pier Point Rd, Cairns City QLD 4870

title: Tropical Beachfront Escape in North Queensland
description: Need some romance in your life? We've got you covered at the luxurious Kewarra Beach Resort & Spa, situated just 15km from laid-back Cairns. Leave the kids behind, or indulge in a romantic escape in this tropical paradise. Stay in a bungalow, with a tropical juice on arrival, two cocktails at the Resort's Paperbark Bar, daily breakfasts, beach yoga or pilates sessions, two $20 spa vouchers, late check-out at 12pm and much more.

title: Tropical Cairns Escape with Rooftop Pool & Great Barrier Reef Cruise Upgrades Available
description:
Situated in the heart of Cairns, this hotel perfectly blends the tranquillity of a tropical escape with the convenience of city life. Refurbished rooms, as well as spacious apartments, are designed for comfort and functionality, with easy access to a rooftop pool offering stunning sunset views over the CBD.

You’ll be steps away from the vibrant Cairns dining precinct, where the city’s best restaurants and bars await. Dive into Cairns’ top attractions, from meeting exotic wildlife at Cairns Zoo and Wildlife Dome to cooling off in the Cairns Esplanade Lagoon and watching boats glide into Cairns Marina - all just a short stroll from your door.

title: Pullman Cairns Five-Star Casino Stay with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Hailed as one of Australia's finest boutique casinos and Far North Queensland's number one gaming destination, the five-star Pullman Reef Hotel Casino is Cairns' ultimate entertainment escape. With views over Trinity Inlet and the magic of the Great Barrier Reef easily accessible just offshore, this seaside haven - stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2022 award - invites you to experience one of the East Coast’s most sought-after destinations. Here, you can embrace breezy tropcial vibes, effortlessly combined with Pullman's signature luxury style in a setting of spectacular natural beauty.

Relax amid light and airy décor with unmistakable Tropical North Queensland touches, lounge beside the glittering rooftop pool overlooking the iconic Trinity Inlet, work up a sweat at the gymnasium, indulge in the freshest local produce at the acclaimed Tamarind or experience amazing flavours inspired by the best street food of several Asian cultures at Soy Kitchen Street Food. If you can tear yourself away from the hotel, a vast natural playground awaits on the doorstep, from day trips for snorkelling and diving to glass-bottom boat tours and fishing on the Great Barrier Reef.

title: Five-Star Cairns Designer Luxury with A$150 Dining Credit
description:
You’ve arrived... welcome to the Crystalbrook Flynn - the flashiest hotel in Cairns’ iconic Crystalbrook Collection trio. A vibrant destination unlike anything you’ve experienced before, this five-star hotel is the place to be and be seen in Cairns.

A social butterfly on the edge of the iconic Esplanade, with impossibly turquoise harbour and Coral Sea views, this distinctive designer retreat features stylish interiors with two shimmering glass pools and an array of world-class dining options. Feel like you’re at the centre of the action as you take the plunge into the vibrant nightlife and entertainment along Cairns Esplanade Lagoon, while away an afternoon hopping between the restaurants of nearby sibling hotels, Crystalbrook Riley and Crystalbrook Bailey, and get lost in the kaleidoscopic beauty of the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Breathtaking water vistas await with an upgrade from an Urban Room to a Harbour-View Room
- Indulge with A$150 food and drinks credit per package, to spend at the hotel’s restaurants and bars or at its sister properties: Crystalbrook Bailey and Crystalbrook Riley
- Start your escape with a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival
- Enjoy a 15% discount on food and drinks at Crystalbrook Flynn and its sister properties
- Guaranteed 1pm late checkout so you can make the most of your final day
- Complimentary daily bicycle hire, Wi-Fi and on-demand movies during your stay

**Sea-view upgrade:** Take a break from reality and drink in stunning vistas of the Coral Sea when you choose the Sea-View Room.

**Travelling with family?** Choose the family-friendly Urban Master room with one king bed and a double sofa bed, where up to two children (11 and under) stay free. Plus, children enjoy free breakfast when dining with a paying adult.

**Extended stay bonus:** Extend your stay and receive an additional A$50 dining credit per day, per package, to enjoy a gourmet exploration across any of Cairns’ Crystalbrook Collection Hotels (Crystalbrook Flynn, Riley and Bailey).

title: Pullman Cairns Luxury Escape with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks

Relax amid light and airy decor with unmistakable Tropical North Queensland touches or lounge beside the glittering rooftop pool overlooking the iconic Trinity Inlet.

Underneath its iconic glass dome roof, you'll find the Reef Hotel Casino, top-rated restaurants and bars, and the Cairns Zoom & Wildlife Dome.

title: Award-Winning Family-Friendly Cairns BIG4 Park with Two Pools, Water Park & Guaranteed Cabin Upgrade
description: Cairns is a big place - why not bring the whole family? Soak up days in the sun at the award-winning BIG4 Ingenia Holidays Cairns Coconut - 11 hectares of family-friendly tropical fun offering easy access to the region’s best. Wander around the park on foot, push bike or pedal car and enjoy the resort’s two swimming pools, SPLASH Water Park and a dreamy adults-only therapeutic spa - the perfect choice for when the kids are enjoying the park's rotating list of child-friendly activities. If you can tear yourself away from the park, nearby attractions include Great Barrier Reef cruises, Kuranda Scenic Railway, Kuranda Skyrail, Port Douglas and more!

title: Cairns: Trinity Beach Apartment Escape near the Great Barrier Reef
description: With the palm-fringed Trinity Beach at its backyard and the coral oasis of the Great Barrier Reef a short distance away, Blue Lagoon Resort could not be more perfectly placed. Discover Cairns' distinct windswept, beachside beauty on this relaxing self-contained apartment escape, offering easy access to a plethora of urban cafés, bars and restaurants along the beachfront. Enjoy a bottle of wine on arrival, 10% dining discount for several local restaurants and a luxuriously late 12pm checkout.
offer_address: 22-26 Trinity Beach Rd, Trinity Beach QLD 4879

title: Pullman Cairns Five-Star Casino Stay with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Experience Cairns like never before with an escape to the five-star Pullman Reef Hotel Casino, Far North Queensland's premier entertainment destination. With views over Trinity Inlet and the magic of the Great Barrier Reef just offshore, this seaside haven effortlessly combines breezy tropical vibes with inimitable Pullman style and amenities, in a setting of spectacular natural beauty.

Relax amid light and airy décor with unmistakable tropical touches, lounge beside the glittering rooftop pool overlooking the iconic Trinity Inlet, work up a sweat at the gymnasium, indulge in the freshest local produce at the acclaimed Tamarind or experience amazing flavours inspired by Asian street food at Soy Kitchen Street Food. If you can tear yourself away from the hotel, a vast natural playground awaits, with everything from snorkelling and diving day trips to glass-bottom boat tours and fishing on the Great Barrier Reef.

title: DoubleTree by Hilton Tropical Cairns Escape with Daily Breakfast & A$100 Dining Credit
description:
Unlock the wonders of Tropical North Queensland and embrace the year-round warm weather with a well-deserved stay at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Cairns - the perfect base to explore the Great Barrier Reef and beyond.

Step straight from the hotel onto the Esplanade and experience the lively, sun-kissed CBD, where you’ll discover a myriad of boutique shops, trendy galleries, cool eateries and the shimmering waterfront lagoon. Once you've covered the city sights, venture further to reach the Great Barrier Reef or wind your way to Palm Cove, Port Douglas and the famed Daintree Rainforest. After action-packed days uncovering regional gems, couples and families can rest and recharge at this sleek property’s gorgeous outdoor pool or work up a sweat in the modern fitness centre before rounding out the day at The Vine Room.

title: Cairns Escape with Daily Breakfast & Complimentary Bottle of Wine
description: Explore Tropical North Queensland and its many wonders with a stay at Cairns Queens Court Hotel. Situated just a ten-minute drive from the airport and in close proximity to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef, the charming Kuranda Scenic Railway, the cute Palm Cove Village, and the lush Daintree Rainforest, Cairns Queens Court Hotel is ideal for your next tropical escape. Enjoy daily breakfast, a bottle of wine in-room on arrival and guaranteed 11am checkout.
offer_address: 167-171 Sheridan St, Cairns North QLD 4870, Australia

title: Brand-New Five-Star Cairns Luxury with A$150 Dining Credit & Harbour-View Upgrade
description:
You’ve arrived... welcome to the brand-new Flynn, a Crystalbrook Collection Hotel - the newest hotel in Cairns’ iconic Crystalbrook Collection trio. A vibrant destination unlike anything you’ve ever experienced before, this five-star hotel is the place to be and be seen in Cairns.

Feel like you’re at the centre of the action as you take the plunge into the vibrant nightlife and entertainment along Cairns Esplanade Lagoon, while away an afternoon hopping between the restaurants of nearby sibling hotels, Riley, a Crystalbrook Collection Resort and Bailey, a Crystalbrook Collection Hotel, and get lost in the kaleidoscopic beauty of the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef.

title: Five-Star Cairns Oasis with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
The talk of Cairns, Crystalbrook Bailey invites you to take the plunge with a five-star designer stay like no other. A stylish tropical oasis with a glittering rooftop pool, the iconic Esplanade boardwalk a short walk away and the coral cays of the world's most spectacular reef easily accessible, Bailey could not be more enticing. This is a unique destination where you can spend your days hopping from the restaurants of nearby sibling hotels, Crystalbrook Riley and Crystalbrook Flynn to enjoying the beauty within Bailey itself, chasing waterfalls and exploring the UNESCO-listed Great Barrier Reef.

Discover the tropical, art-inspired property shaking up Cairns' hotel scene and make Crystalbrook Bailey your launchpad to the wonders of Tropical North Queensland.

**Your handpicked inclusions**

- Fuel up for Cairns adventures with daily 'grab & go' breakfast and coffee
- Dine at Crystalbrook Bailey, Crystalbrook Riley or Crystalbrook Flynn with A$50 food and drinks credit per room, per stay
- Relax with a bottle of house red, white or sparkling wine on arrival
- Take a further 15% off any food or drink purchases at Crystalbrook Bailey, Crystalbrook Riley or Crystalbrook Flynn
- Come and go with ease thanks to complimentary daily self-parking
- Explore Cairns with complimentary daily bicycle hire
- Get cosy with free Wi-Fi and in-room movies
- Make the moment last with 1pm late checkout

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the Urban Master Room, featuring two queen beds for up to two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under).

**Extended stay bonus**: Your drinks and dining credit increases the longer you stay - enjoy A$100 for five nights, A$125 for seven nights and A$150 for nine nights.

title: Top-Rated Waterfront Apartment Escape in the Heart of Cairns
description:
Embrace the laidback vibes of Cairns with a relaxing waterfront stay at the modern, centrally located Jack & Newell Holiday Apartments, ranked in the top five hotels in Cairns on Tripadvisor. Housed in a heritage-listed former wharf warehouse, Jack & Newell Holiday Apartments perfectly blends history and glamour in one of the best addresses in Cairns. 

Behind the renovated heritage façade, you’ll find 15 beautifully designed and fitted apartments, complete with fully equipped kitchens, laundry facilities, and modern amenities. Add to this sweeping city and waterfront views, a sparkling pool area with palm trees, BBQ facilities, and a fully equipped gym, and you’ll be feeling relaxed and rejuvenated in no time. Step outside the hotel’s doors and into the action: head to Reef Fleet Terminal for day trips to the Great Barrier Reef, stroll down the busy esplanade to find an abundance of stylish bars, or relax by the waterfront lagoon - all within easy reach of your apartment.

title: Central Cairns Art Deco Stay with Rooftop Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Perfectly situated in the heart of Cairns, The Benson Hotel welcomes you with open arms to a tropical retreat. Boasting Art Deco-inspired interiors, an outdoor terrace and the vibrant Benson Bar & Restaurant, this modern hotel offers a trendsetting atmosphere for guests to enjoy.

The hotel's refreshed rooms are styled with colourful and plush finishing touches, from the dreamy bedding to the velvet chairs, ensuring a welcoming home-away-from-home for your Queensland escape. Spend your afternoon basking in the sun-kissed waters of the rooftop pool and enjoying the views stretching from the city to the mountains in the distance.

Explore the best of Cairns from this central location, venturing between the crystal-clear ocean, Great Barrier Reef and lush Daintree Rainforest. Tropical North Queensland is the place to be for warm weather, sunshine and unmatched beauty - chase the perfect waterfall, boat between secluded islands and eat your way through the best on offer.

title: Tropical Cairns Escape with Welcome Drink & Daily Breakfast
description:
Coral cays, ancient rainforests, azure natural reefs, stylish bars and innovative eateries: tick off a multitude of must-do moments with a stay at Nightcap at Balaclava Hotel, Cairns. Tantalisingly close to the famous Great Barrier Reef and Kuranda Scenic Railway, and just a 15-minute drive from Cairns Airport, Nightcap at Balaclava Hotel is the perfect base from which to discover Tropical North Queensland’s treasure trove of natural wonders and outdoor adventures.

Pairing modern hotel facilities and outstanding service with family-friendly accommodation, this is a laidback home-away-from-home, where you can rest in complete comfort after long days exploring.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Enjoy a daily continental breakfast box including cereal, milk, juice and a muesli bar
- Celebrate your escape with a welcome drink (beer, glass of wine or soft drink) each on arrival
- Dine out with 10% off at Graziers Steakhouse throughout your stay
- Come and go as you please with complimentary parking for one vehicle throughout your stay
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

title: Five-Star Hilton Cairns Tropical Escape with Daily Breakfast & A$100 Dining Credit
description:
The natural beauty of Tropical North Queensland is yours to explore with a glamorous stay at the five-star family-friendly Hilton Cairns, a luxurious waterfront retreat boasting one of the best locations in this laid-back city. Just steps from the main shopping strip, restaurants, and vibrant entertainment, this lavish sanctuary is the perfect launchpad for discovering the beautiful wonders of the region and an idyllic place to retreat to after days filled with sun-kissed adventures.

This tropical oasis offers state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service - from the blissful heated lagoon pool to the expert chefs preparing signature dishes at award-winning restaurant Mondo. Head to the Reef Fleet Terminal for day trips to the Great Barrier Reef, wind through the jaw-dropping rainforest on the Kuranda Scenic Railway or take a stunning one-hour coastal drive to Port Douglas. Back in Cairns, stroll down the busy esplanade to find an abundance of stylish bars, or relax by the waterfront lagoon as the sun sets in the distance.

title: Accor Apartment Stay in Prime Cairns Harbour Location
description: Enjoy a prime position on the Cairns waterfront at Cairns Harbour Lights by Accor, overlooking the harbour and Trinity Inlet. Stay in an upgraded One-Bedroom apartment, offering modern living with stunning contemporary décor, a lounge, balcony and full kitchen, and benefit from easy access to some of Cairns’ best restaurants. Includes one three-course set-menu dinner for two at the award-winning Ochre Restaurant, a breakfast hamper and bottle of wine on arrival, daily housekeeping and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Five-Star Hilton Cairns Escape with Daily Breakfast, A$150 Dining Credit & Coral Sea Views
description: The beauty of Tropical North Queensland is yours to explore from Hilton Cairns, a five-star waterfront oasis ideally located a short walk from the town’s boutique shops, trendy restaurants and vibrant entertainment.

title: Top-Rated Waterfront Family Apartment Escape in the Heart of Cairns
description:
Embrace the laidback vibes of Cairns with a relaxing waterfront stay at the modern, centrally located Jack & Newell Holiday Apartments - currently ranked in the top three hotels in the city on Tripadvisor. Easily recognisable thanks to the beautiful, heritage-listed façade dating back to 1911, this boutique property offers a collection of self-contained apartments fitted with modern amenities, and a sparkling pool to make the most of Queensland's balmy weather.

Pick between a two-bedroom apartment for four or a three-bedroom apartment for six, located a leisurely walk from Reef Fleet Terminal (where you can hop on a Great Barrier Reef cruise), the iconic Esplanade and the city's boutique shops, trendy restaurants and vibrant entertainment.

title: Five-Star Cairns Designer Luxury with A$150 Dining Credit & Harbour-View Upgrade
description:
You’ve arrived... welcome to the five-star Crystalbrook Flynn - the newest hotel in Cairns’ iconic Crystalbrook Collection trio. A vibrant destination unlike anything you’ve ever experienced before, this five-star hotel is the place to be and be seen in Cairns.

A social butterfly on the edge of the iconic Esplanade, with impossibly turquoise harbour and Coral Sea views, this distinctive designer retreat features stylish interiors with two shimmering glass pools and a whole new level of world-class dining options. Feel like you’re at the centre of the action as you take the plunge into the vibrant nightlife and entertainment along Cairns Esplanade Lagoon, while away an afternoon hopping between the restaurants of nearby sibling hotels, Crystalbrook Riley and Crystalbrook Bailey, and get lost in the kaleidoscopic beauty of the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Breathtaking water vistas await with an upgrade from an Urban Room to a Harbour-View Room
- Indulge with A$150 food and drinks credit per package to spend at the hotel’s restaurants and bars, or at its sister properties, Crystalbrook Bailey and Crystalbrook Riley
- Savour a Davidson Plum Negroni on arrival to start your escape the right way
- Enjoy a 15% discount on food and drinks at Crystalbrook Flynn and its sister properties

title: Five-Star Pullman Cairns Luxury with A$150 Dining Credit & Harbour Views
description:
A sun-dappled deck, bobbing yachts in the harbour, mountain vistas and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef on the doorstep… there’s no better place to take in the jaw-dropping beauty of Tropical North Queensland than the five-star Pullman Cairns International.

Experience signature Pullman luxury at its finest within the heart of Cairns following a multimillion-dollar facelift. This includes a significant upgrade to selected Superior Rooms from level 3 to level 11, offering monochromatic tones and light wood-coloured accents designed to complement the hotel's historic past and future vision, with each detail perfectly curated for tropical relaxation. Be sure to make use of the gleaming swimming pool, sleek spa and fitness centre, and dine at one of Cairns' best seafood restaurants - Coco's Kitchen + Bar. It gets better - this tropical oasis is located just a short walk from the Reef Fleet Terminal and an easy stroll to the vibrant Esplanade, bursting with waterside bars, trendy boutiques, vivacious entertainment and seafood galore.

title: Top-Rated Waterside Apartment Escape in the Heart of Cairns with Welcome Drinks & Late Checkout
description: Embrace the laidback vibe of Cairns with a waterfront stay at the modern and centrally located Jack & Newell Holiday Apartments. Behind the renovated heritage facade, you’ll find 15 beautifully designed and fitted apartments, complete with sizeable kitchens, laundry facilities, and modern amenities. Add to this sweeping city and ocean views, a sparkling pool with palm trees, BBQ facilities and a fully equipped gym - you’ll feel relaxed and rejuvenated in no time. Step outside the hotel’s doors to be within the action: head to Reef Fleet Terminal for day trips to the Great Barrier Reef, stroll down the busy esplanade to find an abundance of stylish bars, or relax by the waterfront lagoon - all within easy reach of your apartment.

title: Central Cairns Art Deco-Styled Stay with Rooftop Pool Terrace & Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover the newly renovated Benson Hotel, perfectly situated in the heart of Cairns. With its Art Deco-inspired interiors, outdoor terrace and vibrant Benson Bar & Restaurant, serving breakfast favourites and a shared dinner menu, this hotel offers a trendsetting and inviting atmosphere for guests to enjoy. The Benson Hotel provides well-appointed rooms, versatile event spaces and a warm and friendly team, ensuring a welcoming home-away-from-home for your tropical escape. Spend your afternoon basking in the sun-kissed waters of the rooftop pool and enjoying the views stretching from the city to the mountains in the distance.

Explore the best of Cairns from this central location, venturing between the crystal-clear ocean, Great Barrier Reef and lush Daintree Rainforest. Tropical North Queensland is the place to be for warm weather, sunshine and unmatched beauty - chase the perfect waterfall, boat between secluded islands and eat your way through the best on offer with a gorgeous selection of nearby restaurants and markets showcasing local produce.

title: Shangri-La Cairns Waterfront Oasis with Marina Views & A$50 Dining Credit + Reef Cruise Upgrades Available
description:
Experience the magic of Tropical North Queensland, with its dazzling white-sand beaches and turquoise waters, from this five-star resort-style escape right on the water. With views over Trinity Inlet and the magic of the Great Barrier Reef easily accessible just offshore, this seaside haven invites you to experience one of the East Coast’s most sought-after destinations.

Here, you can embrace breezy tropical vibes, effortlessly combined with Shangri-La's signature luxury style in a setting of spectacular natural beauty. Relax amid light and airy decor with unmistakable Tropical North Queensland touches or lounge beside the glittering pool surrounded by swaying palm trees.

Experience stunning waterfront dining at the acclaimed ‘The Backyard’ restaurant, where you can indulge in the freshest local produce. Alternatively, savour exceptional modern Australian cuisine at the Pool Bar. 

If you can tear yourself away from the hotel, a vast natural playground awaits on the doorstep, from day trips for snorkelling and diving to glass-bottom boat tours and fishing on the Great Barrier Reef.
offer_address: Pier Point Road, Cairns, Queensland 4870, Australia

title: Tropical Cairns Apartment Stay near Trinity Beach with Welcome Wine
description:
Offering a taste of stylish seaside living near palm-fringed Trinity Beach and the majestic Great Barrier Reef, Blue Lagoon Resort captures the coastal charm of Cairns, perfectly packaged into self-contained apartments with fantastic facilities. A coastal-cool escape with a spectacular location a short stroll from Trinity Beach’s golden sands, the resort is within a short drive of tranquil Palm Cove and Cairns’ vibrant esplanade. Also close to Kuranda National Park - and the Skyrail Rainforest Cableway - this sun-kissed resort is perfect for adventurous couples and families who love the outdoors.

This revitalising studio stay includes a welcome bottle of New Zealand sauvignon blanc on arrival, a 10% dining discount at Bangkok Rose Thai, Blue Moon Grill and L’Unico Italian restaurant, and a luxuriously late 12pm checkout.

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the coastal-chic Two-Bedroom Apartment for four.
offer_address: 22-26 Trinity Beach Rd, Trinity Beach QLD 4879

title: Five-Star Pullman Cairns Stay near Harbour with Daily Buffet Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Reef Cruise Upgrade Available
description:
A sun-dappled deck, bobbing yachts in the harbour, mountain vistas and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef on the doorstep … there’s no better place to take in the beauty of Tropical North Queensland than the five-star Pullman Cairns International. Experience signature Pullman comfort at its finest within the heart of Cairns following a multimillion-dollar facelift. This includes a significant upgrade to selected Superior Rooms from level 3 to level 11, offering monochromatic tones and light wood-coloured accents designed to complement the hotel's historic past and future vision.

Be sure to make use of the gleaming swimming pool, sleek spa and fitness centre, and dine at one of Cairns' best seafood restaurants - Coco's Kitchen + Bar - also host to divinely decadent high tea if you favour your sweet tooth. It gets better - this tropical oasis is located just a short walk from the Reef Fleet Terminal and an easy stroll to the vibrant Esplanade, bursting with waterside bars, trendy boutiques, vivacious entertainment and seafood galore.

title: Grand Re-Opening: Novotel Cairns Escape with Daily Breakfast - Two Kids Stay Free
description: Revel in the coastal bliss of Tropical North Queensland with a picture-perfect escape for families and couples at the renowned and newly renovated Novotel Cairns Oasis Resort. Take a plunge in the massive lagoon pool, relax at Cairn's only swim-up pool bar and get adventurous with easy access to the Great Barrier Reef and Cairns Esplanade. Having unveiled a contemporary new look in October 2019 thanks to a multi-million-dollar refurbishment, you'll love sleeping in a freshly revamped and upgraded Deluxe King Room with daily full buffet breakfast for two adults, an AU$50 food and drink credit to use at Moku Restaurant + Bar, complimentary Wi-Fi and guaranteed 12pm late checkout so you can take advantage of this sun-soaked escape to the uttermost. Travelling with family? Two kids (15 years and under) stay free with breakfast in Deluxe Twin Rooms!

title: Tropical Cairns Launchpad with Daily Breakfast and Complimentary Bottle of Wine
description: Luminous ocean, ancient rainforest, stunning natural reef, great food, wine and culture: tick off a multitude of must-do moments with a stay at Cairns Queens Court Hotel. The perfect launchpad to discover Tropical North Queensland or for a short stay en route to the Whitsundays and the Great Barrier Reef, experience it all with three-nights in a Premier Room, daily à la carte breakfast, a bottle of wine in-room on arrival and guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

title: Relaxing Apartment Escape in Tropical Cairns
description: Explore the gateway to the Great Barrier Reef with a relaxing stay at the Blue Lagoon Resort, located minutes from the palm fringed Trinity Beach and an abundance of casual beachside cafes, bars and restaurants. Stay in a modern, self-contained apartment and enjoy a bottle of wine on arrival, a 10% dining discount and a late 12pm check-out.
offer_address: 22-26 Trinity Beach Rd, Trinity Beach QLD 4879

title: Five-Star Cairns Designer Luxury with A$250 Dining Credit & Great Barrier Reef Cruise
description:
You’ve arrived... welcome to the Crystalbrook Flynn - the newest hotel in Cairns’ iconic Crystalbrook Collection trio. A vibrant destination unlike anything you’ve experienced before, this five-star hotel is the place to be and be seen in Cairns.

A social butterfly on the edge of the iconic Esplanade, with impossibly turquoise harbour and Coral Sea views, this distinctive designer retreat features stylish interiors with two shimmering glass pools and an array of world-class dining options. Feel like you’re at the centre of the action as you take the plunge into the vibrant nightlife and entertainment along Cairns Esplanade Lagoon, while away an afternoon hopping between the restaurants of nearby sibling hotels, Crystalbrook Riley and Crystalbrook Bailey, and get lost in the kaleidoscopic beauty of the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Breathtaking water vistas await with an upgrade from an Urban Room to a Harbour-View Room
- Full-day Great Barrier Reef cruise with Great Adventures, departing Cairns: spend the day exploring the Great Barrier Reef and  enjoy lunch and afternoon tea
- Indulge with A$250 food and drinks credit per package, to spend at the hotel’s restaurants and bars or at its sister properties: Crystalbrook Bailey and Crystalbrook Riley
- Start your escape with a complimentary bottle of wine on arrival
- Enjoy a 15% discount on food and drinks at Crystalbrook Flynn and its sister properties
- Guaranteed 1pm late checkout so you can make the most of your final day
- Complimentary daily bicycle hire, Wi-Fi and on-demand movies during your stay

**Sea-View Upgrade:** Take a break from reality and drink in stunning vistas of the Coral Sea when you choose the Sea-View Room.

**Travelling with family?** Choose the family-friendly Urban Master room with one king bed and a double sofa bed, and up to two children (11 and under) stay free. Plus, children enjoy free breakfast when dining with a paying adult.

**Longer Stay Bonus:** Extend your stay and receive an additional A$50 dining credit per day, per package, to enjoy a gourmet exploration across any of Cairns’ Crystalbrook Collection Hotels (Flynn, Riley and Bailey).

title: Cairns Harbourside Apartment Escape with Three-Course Dinner
description: Relax beside the Coral Sea with a self-contained apartment escape at The Sebel Cairns Harbour Lights, a waterfront retreat in one of Cairns' most exclusive locations. Positioned directly on the bustling marina, this waterfront oasis brings the very best of Cairns to your doorstep and takes you just a short walk from the Reef Fleet Terminal, the iconic Esplanade and the city's boutique shops, trendy restaurants and vibrant entertainment.

title: Top-Rated Pullman Cairns Escape with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Hailed as one of Australia's finest boutique casinos, Far North Queensland's number one gaming destination claiming Tripadvisor's Travellers' Choice 2023 award, the five-star Pullman Reef Hotel Casino is Cairns' ultimate entertainment escape. With views over Trinity Inlet and the magic of the Great Barrier Reef easily accessible just offshore, this seaside haven invites you to experience one of the East Coast’s most sought-after destinations. Here, you can embrace breezy tropical vibes, effortlessly combined with Pullman's signature luxury style in a setting of spectacular natural beauty.

Relax amid light and airy decor with unmistakable Tropical North Queensland touches, lounge beside the glittering rooftop pool overlooking the iconic Trinity Inlet, work up a sweat at the gym, indulge in the freshest local produce at the acclaimed Tamarind restaurant or experience amazing flavours inspired by the best street food of several Asian cultures at Soy Kitchen Street Food. If you can tear yourself away from the hotel, a vast natural playground awaits on the doorstep, from day trips for snorkelling and diving to glass-bottom boat tours and fishing on the Great Barrier Reef.

title: Pullman Cairns Five-Star Casino Stay with Daily Drinks & A$100 Dining & Drinks Credit
description:
Hailed as one of Australia's finest boutique casinos and Far North Queensland's #1 gaming destination, the world-class Pullman Reef Hotel Casino is Cairns' ultimate entertainment escape. With views over Trinity Inlet and the magic of the Great Barrier Reef easily accessible, this luxurious Pullman oasis invites you to experience the vibrancy of Cairns with a five-star stay that proudly ranks among Tripadvisor's top 1% worldwide, Australia's top 25 luxury hotels and Cairns' top three hotels. Underneath its iconic glass dome roof, you'll find the Reef Hotel Casino, top-rated restaurants and bars, and the Cairns Zoom & Wildlife Dome.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Set up for a day of fun in Cairns with daily breakfast
- Taste your way through the hotel's dining outlets with A$100 food and drinks credit per package
- Head to any casino bar for a daily glass of house wine, beer, basic spirit or soft drink per adult
- Enjoy the convenience of daily self-parking for one vehicle per stay
- Take it easy with a leisurely 12pm checkout
- Stay connected with free Wi-Fi

**Travelling with kids?** One child (aged 12 years and under) stays free across all room types. Or choose the Family Upgrade for up to two adults and three children aged 12 years and under (children aged 13 to 16 years may stay for a surcharge, see individual packages for details).

**Longer-stay bonus**: Ramp up the relaxation with an extended five- or six-night stay and enjoy A$150 drinks and dining credit, or A$200 when you stay seven nights or more.

**Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2020** Top 25 Luxury Hotels - Australia

title: Cairns Esplanade Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Rooftop Drinks
description: For an unparalleled location along the glittering Esplanade and a rooftop bar overlooking the Coral Sea, look no further than the brand-new Oaks Cairns Hotel. Just opened in September 2020, this is one of the newest places to stay in Cairns, where you can laze among the palms of nearby Cairns Lagoon, meander along the Esplanade and watch the sunset at the vibrant Oak & Vine rooftop bar and restaurant.

title: Five-Star Hilton Cairns Escape with Daily Breakfast, A$100 Dining Credit & Sea-View Room Upgrade
description:
The natural beauty of Tropical North Queensland is yours to explore from a five-star launchpad: Hilton Cairns - a luxurious waterfront retreat boasting one of the best locations in town. Ideally situated only steps from the town’s boutique shops, trendy restaurants and vibrant entertainment, this lavish oasis is the perfect launchpad for discovering the wonders of the region and an idyllic place to retreat to after days filled with sun-kissed adventures.

Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 award, Hilton Cairns offers guests a first-class experience through its state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service - from the lavish heated lagoon pool to the expert chefs preparing signature dishes at award-winning restaurant Mondo.

It's easy to reach incredible natural wonders from your five-star hotel. Head to the Reef Fleet Terminal for day trips to the Great Barrier Reef - rightfully named one of the Seven Wonders of the World - wind through jaw-dropping rainforest on the Kuranda Scenic Railway or take a stunning one-hour coastal drive to the laidback town of Port Douglas. In Cairns, stroll down the busy esplanade to find an abundance of stylish bars, or relax by the waterfront lagoon with an ice cream.

title: Five-Star Cairns Designer Luxury with A$50 Daily Dining Credit & Harbour-View Room Upgrade
description:
You’ve arrived... welcome to the five-star Crystalbrook Flynn - the newest hotel in Cairns’ iconic Crystalbrook Collection trio. A vibrant destination unlike anything you’ve experienced before, this five-star hotel is the place to be and be seen in Cairns.

A social butterfly on the edge of the iconic Esplanade, with impossibly turquoise harbour and Coral Sea views, this distinctive designer retreat features stylish interiors with two shimmering glass pools and a whole new level of world-class dining options. Feel like you’re at the centre of the action as you take the plunge into the vibrant nightlife and entertainment along Cairns Esplanade Lagoon, while away an afternoon hopping between the restaurants of nearby sibling hotels, Crystalbrook Riley and Crystalbrook Bailey, and get lost in the kaleidoscopic beauty of the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Breathtaking water vistas await with an upgrade from an Urban Room to a Harbour-View Room
- Indulge with A$50 food and drinks credit per day, per package (A$150 total credit per package), to spend at the hotel’s restaurants and bars or at its sister properties: Crystalbrook Bailey and Crystalbrook Riley
- Savour a Davidson Plum Negroni on arrival to start your escape the right way
- Enjoy a 15% discount on food and drinks at Crystalbrook Flynn and its sister properties
- Relax with daily onsite self-parking for one vehicle
- Guaranteed 1pm late checkout to make the most of your final day
- Complimentary daily bicycle hire, Wi-Fi and on-demand movies during your stay

**Sea-View Upgrade bonus:** Take a break from reality and drink in stunning vistas of the Coral Sea along with a complimentary 'cocktail of the day' per adult when you choose the Sea-View Room.

**Travelling with family?** Choose the Family Urban Master Room, featuring Cairns city views, one king bed and a double sofa bed, and up to two children (11 and under) stay free. Children eat free for breakfast when dining with a paying adult.

**Longer-stay bonus:** Extend your stay and receive an additional A$50 dining credit per day, per package, to enjoy a gourmet exploration across any of Cairns’ Crystalbrook Collection Hotels (Flynn, Riley and Bailey).

title: Discover Cairns: The Gateway to the Great Barrier Reef
description: Explore the gateway to the Great Barrier Reef with a relaxing stay in tropical Cairns staying at the Blue Lagoon Resort, located minutes from the palm fringed Trinity Beach and an abundance of casual beachside cafes, bars and restaurants. Stay in a convenient, self-contained apartment and enjoy a bottle of wine on arrival, a 10% dining discount and a late 2pm check-out.
offer_address: 22-26 Trinity Beach Rd, Trinity Beach QLD 4879

title: Five-Star Pullman Cairns Casino Stay with Daily Drinks & A$100 Dining Credit
description:
Hailed as one of Australia's finest boutique casinos, and Far North Queensland's #1 gaming destination, the world-class Pullman Reef Hotel Casino is Cairns' ultimate entertainment escape. With views over Trinity Inlet and the magic of the Great Barrier Reef easily accessible, this luxurious Pullman oasis invites you to experience the vibrancy of Cairns with a five-star stay that proudly ranks among TripAdvisor's top 1% worldwide and Cairns' top three hotels. Underneath its iconic glass dome roof, you'll find the Reef Hotel Casino, top-rated restaurants and bars, and the Cairns Zoom & Wildlife Dome.

This boutique stay near the water includes daily breakfast, one nightly drink per adult, A$100 dining credit per room towards food at Cairns' only chef-hatted restaurant, the award-winning Tamarind restaurant, daily self-parking for one vehicle, per stay, and a luxuriously late 12pm checkout.

**This offer has no surcharges:** travel when it suits you, for the same incredible price.

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged 12 years and under) stays free with daily breakfast.

title: Central Cairns Art Deco-Styled Stay with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Great Barrier Cruise Upgrade Available
description:
Perfectly situated in the heart of Cairns, The Benson Hotel welcomes you with open arms to a tropical retreat. Boasting Art Deco-inspired interiors, a tranquil outdoor terrace and the vibrant Benson Bar & Restaurant, serving breakfast favourites and a sumptuous lunch and dinner menu, this hotel offers a trendsetting atmosphere for guests to enjoy. The hotel's refreshed rooms are styled with colourful and plush finishing touches from the dreamy bedding to the velvet chairs, ensuring a welcoming home-away-from-home for your tropical escape. Spend your afternoon basking in the sun-kissed waters of the rooftop pool and enjoying the views stretching from the city to the mountains in the distance.

Explore the best of Cairns from this central location, venturing between the crystal-clear ocean, Great Barrier Reef and lush Daintree Rainforest. Tropical North Queensland is the place to be for warm weather, sunshine and unmatched beauty - chase the perfect waterfall, boat between secluded islands and eat your way through the best on offer with a gorgeous selection of nearby restaurants and markets showcasing local produce.

title: Brand New Five-Star Cairns Oasis with Dining Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
The talk of Cairns, Bailey, a Crystalbrook Collection Hotel, invites you to take the plunge with a five-star designer stay like no other. A brand-new tropical oasis with a glittering rooftop pool, the iconic Esplanade boardwalk a short walk away and the coral cays of the world's most spectacular coral reef easily accessible, Bailey could not be more enticing.

This is a unique destination where you can spend your days hopping from the restaurants of nearby sibling hotels Riley and Flynn, discovering the beauty within Bailey itself, and chasing waterfalls or exploring the UNESCO-Listed Great Barrier Reef.

Your tropical escape to this newly-opened hotel includes a daily ‘grab & go’ breakfast with one coffee per person, a welcome bottle of wine in-room on arrival, A$50 dining credit per stay and a 15% dining discount towards all three of Crystalbrook’s iconic hotels - Bailey, Riley and Flynn. Plus, enjoy complimentary in-room movies, Wi-Fi, daily onsite self-parking, complimentary bicycle hire per day, subject to availability, and guaranteed 1pm late checkout.

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the Urban Master Room, featuring two queen beds for two adults and two children (aged 11 years and under).

**This deal has NO surcharges**: Travel anytime, even during school holidays, for the same great price.

title: Tropical Cairns Stay 10 Minutes from the Marina with Steakhouse, Sports Bar & A$50 Dining Credit
description: Coral cays, ancient rainforests and azure natural reefs - tick off a multitude of must-do moments with a stay at Nightcap at Balaclava Hotel in Cairns. Tantalisingly close to the famous Great Barrier Reef and Kuranda Scenic Railway, and just a 15-minute drive from Cairns Airport, this is the perfect base from which to discover Tropical North Queensland’s treasure trove of natural wonders and outdoor adventures. When not out exploring, indulge in an expertly prepared char-grilled steak at Grazier's Steakhouse or a cold sip in the Sports Bar. Pairing modern hotel facilities and outstanding service with family-friendly accommodation, Nightcap at Balaclava Hotel is a laidback home-away-from-home where you can rest in comfort after a long day exploring.

title: Cairns Esplanade Escape near Coral Sea
description: With a picture-perfect location on the iconic Cairns Esplanade, three tropical swimming pools, and easy access to the Great Barrier Reef cruise terminals, Rydges Esplanade Resort Cairns is the ultimate Far North Queensland escape. Perched close to the waterfront and surrounded by restaurants and bars, this is the perfect place to watch the sunrise over the Coral Sea and visit the region's landmarks, such as Kuranda Scenic Railway, the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest, and beyond.
offer_address: 209-217 Abbott St, Cairns City QLD 4870, Australia

title: Top-Rated Waterside Apartment Escape in the Heart of Cairns
description: Embrace the laidback vibes and tropical weather of Far North Queensland with a relaxing stay at the modern, centrally located Jack & Newell Holiday Apartments. Boasting one of the best addresses in Cairns, this unique property features a heritage-listed facade dating back to 1911, a collection of spacious, self-contained apartments and a glittering pool - making this the perfect base for groups and families.

title: Cairns Ocean-View Family Apartment Escape
description:
Round up the kids and embrace the laidback vibes and tropical weather of Far North Queensland with a relaxing, family stay at the modern, centrally located Jack & Newell Cairns Holiday Apartments. Blending history and glamour in one of the best addresses in Cairns, this unique property boasts a heritage-listed facade dating back to 1911 and a collection of spacious, self-contained apartments - making this the perfect base to explore the area for the whole family.

Choose a two or three-bedroom apartment with luxe facilities, and find yourself a leisurely walk away from Reef Fleet Terminal (where you can hop on a Great Barrier Reef cruise), Cairns Esplanade and all the town’s most iconic sites.

title: Pullman Cairns Oasis near Marina & Esplanade with Onsite Restaurant & Day Spa
description:
A sun-dappled deck, bobbing yachts in the harbour, mountain vistas and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef on the doorstep … there’s no better place to take in the beauty of Tropical North Queensland than with a stay at Pullman Cairns International.

Be sure to make use of the gleaming swimming pool, sleek day spa and fitness centre, and dine at one of Cairns’ best seafood restaurants - Coco’s Kitchen + Bar - also host to divinely decadent high tea. Plus, this tropical oasis is located just a short walk from the Reef Fleet Terminal and an easy stroll to the vibrant Esplanade.

title: Pullman Cairns Escape Just Steps from Reef Fleet Terminal with Rooftop Pool & Four Dining Venues
description:
With views over Trinity Inlet and the wonder of the Great Barrier Reef easily accessible just offshore from departures at Reef Fleet Terminal, this seaside haven invites you to experience one of the East Coast’s most sought-after destinations.

Indulge in fresh local produce at Tamarind or experience dishes inspired by Southeast Asian flavours at Soy Kitchen Street Food. If you can tear yourself away from the hotel, a natural playground awaits on your doorstep, from snorkelling and diving to day trips among the nearby rainforests of Kuranda and the Daintree.
offer_address: 35-41 Wharf Street PO Box 7320 PO Box 7320, Cairns, Queensland 4870, Australia

title: Five-Star Crystalbrook Cairns Escape with Sea Views, Glass Swimming Pool & Day Spa
description: Set on the iconic Cairns Lagoon, this designer retreat is all about laidback luxury. A social butterfly on the edge of the iconic Esplanade, with impossibly turquoise harbour and Coral Sea views, this distinctive designer retreat features stylish interiors with two shimmering glass pools and an array of world-class dining options. Feel like you’re at the centre of the action and get lost in the kaleidoscopic beauty of the nearby UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef.

title: Waterfront Apartment Escape in the Heart of Cairns with Welcome Wine
description:
Embrace the laidback vibes of Cairns with a relaxing waterfront stay at the modern, centrally located Jack & Newell Holiday Apartments. Housed in a heritage-listed former wharf warehouse, Jack & Newell Holiday Apartments perfectly blends history and glamour in one of the best addresses in Cairns. Behind the renovated heritage façade, you’ll find 15 beautifully designed and fitted apartments, complete with fully equipped kitchens, laundry facilities and modern amenities. Add to this sweeping city and waterfront views, a sparkling pool area with swaying palm trees, BBQ facilities and a fully equipped gym, and you’ll be feeling relaxed and rejuvenated in no time.

The unbeatable location makes it easy to explore Cairns. Step outside the hotel’s doors and into the action: head to Reef Fleet Terminal for day trips to the Great Barrier Reef, stroll down the busy esplanade to find an abundance of stylish bars or relax by the waterfront lagoon - all within easy reach of your apartment.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Your choice of a **bottle of wine or six-pack of local beers** on arrival 
- Explore Cairns with **daily self-parking for one car** 
- Make the most of your last day with **guaranteed 11am checkout** 
- Stay connected with **complimentary Wi-Fi** 
- Enjoy a **5% discount on tours and attractions** booked at the hotel
- Indulge with a **10% discount at the popular Wharf One** **Café** (for stays of 4+ nights)

**Travelling as a larger group?** Choose a spacious, beautifully appointed two-bedroom apartment for four guests or three-bedroom apartment for six guests.

**Water-View Upgrades available:** Upgrade your two or three-bedroom apartment to a Water-View Apartment, offering unparalleled views over the Coral Sea from private balconies.

title: Modern Cairns Escape on The Esplanade with Lagoon-Style Pool
description: Experience the beauty of Tropical North Queensland at this contemporary escape just steps from the vibrant pier and marina. With its prime location on The Esplanade, seize the chance to see the nearby Great Barrier Reef, or venture out to explore the yacht harbour and bustling street cafes. Feel at home in your ultra-modern room or self-contained apartment, enjoy a refreshing dip in the lagoon-style pool, unwind with a rejuvenating soak in the spa.

title: Cairns Esplanade Oasis with Lagoon-Style Pool & City's Highest Rooftop Bar
description: Experience the tropical allure of Cairns from the luxury of the five-star Riley by Crystalbrook Collection. Ideally located on the Esplanade, the hotel is just a short stroll from the vibrant dining and shopping precinct. Savour innovative flavours at Paper Crane or enjoy a cocktail at Rocco, Cairns' highest rooftop bar. Explore the nearby Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest, or simply relax by the spectacular lagoon pool.

title: Tropical Cairns Waterfront Retreat with Outdoor Pool & Spa
description: Escape to the lush warmth of Tropical North Queensland with a tranquil retreat at Holiday Inn Cairns Harbourside, an IHG Hotel, set in a prime position on the Esplanade with magnificent views of the sparkling ocean and verdant hinterland. Enjoy the heavenly weather from the outdoor pool, the spa, or your own private balcony, indulge in a paddock-to-plate dining experience at Harbourside Bar & Kitchen, or wander out the door and into one of the acclaimed restaurants along the Esplanade.
location_description: Holiday Inn Cairns Harbourside, an IHG Hotel

title: Modern Cairns Esplanade Escape with Rooftop Restaurant & Bar
description: Venture to Far North Queensland and experience a stay to remember at Oaks Cairns Hotel, perfectly located on the bustling Cairns Esplanade overlooking the shimmering Coral Sea. You’ll be within easy flip-flopping distance of Cairns CBD, the Cairns Convention Centre and the city’s dazzling beaches, and the incredible Great Barrier Reef is just a short boat trip away. If you’d rather stay in, the hotel’s rooftop restaurant and bar, Oak & Vine, serves superb cuisine, and the menu offers a fiery blend of Peruvian and Japanese-inspired dishes, perfectly complemented by exquisite cocktails.

title: Top-Rated Waterside Apartment Escape in the Heart of Cairns
description: Embrace the laidback vibes of Cairns with a relaxing waterside stay at the modern, centrally located Jack & Newell Holiday Apartments. Behind the renovated heritage facade, you’ll find 15 beautifully designed apartments, complete with fully equipped kitchens, laundry facilities, and modern amenities. Add sweeping city and water views, a sparkling pool area with palm trees, BBQ facilities, and a fully equipped gym, and you’ll be feeling relaxed in no time.

title: Five-Star Cairns Oasis with Rooftop Pool, Pet-Friendly Rooms & Art Inspired Decor
description: Experience the artistic soul of Cairns with a stay at this exquisite and modern sanctuary in the heart of the city's vibrant arts precinct. This contemporary retreat offers easy access to the Cairns Performing Arts Centre, local galleries and the bustling Esplanade. Savour locally sourced dishes at the hotel's three unique eateries, including the chic CC's Bar and Grill, or explore the city's thriving food scene. For a change of pace, venture to the Great Barrier Reef or Daintree Rainforest for unforgettable natural encounters.

title: Cairns Five-Star Shangri-La Escape at the Gateway to the Great Barrier Reef
description:
Experience the magic of Tropical North Queensland with its dazzling white-sand beaches and turquoise waters from the world-class Shangri-La The Marina, Cairns, a five-star resort-style escape right on the water.

Cairns Esplanade's stylish bars and world-class restaurants are at your fingertips, as is the Reef Fleet Terminal, your gateway to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, Shangri-La The Marina, Cairns has a lagoon-style pool, lush gardens and a health club with state-of-the-art equipment. For gourmands, don't miss The Backyard Restaurant overlooking the waterfront.
offer_address: Pier Point Rd, Cairns City QLD 4870

title: Cairns Esplanade Escape Overlooking the Coral Sea
description: Craving a trip to the tropics? Look no further than Rydges Esplanade Resort Cairns, boasting a picture-perfect location on the iconic Cairns Esplanade and easy access to the Great Barrier Reef cruise terminals. This stylish property places everything you need at your fingertips, and when you're ready to return to your Cairns base, enjoy the use of the three tropical swimming pools and two tennis courts. Throughout your stay, be sure to catch the sunset over the Coral Sea from one of the many restaurants and bars near the water, or visit the region's must-see sights, including Kuranda Scenic Railway and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest
offer_address: 209-217 Abbott St, Cairns City QLD 4870, Australia

title: Newly Renovated and Re-branded Art Deco Hotel in Heart of Cairns with Outdoor Pool Terrace
description: Discover the newly renovated and re-branded Benson Hotel, perfectly situated in the heart of Cairns. With its Art Deco-inspired interior, outdoor terrace, and vibrant Benson Bar & Restaurant, the hotel offers a stylish and inviting atmosphere for guests to enjoy. The Benson provides well-appointed rooms, versatile event spaces, and a warm and friendly team, ensuring a welcoming home away from home in the bustling CBD.

title: Beachfront Cairns Esplanade Escape with Lagoon Pool & Ocean Views
description: Explore seaside living in Cairns with a stay along the city's Esplanade. Lounge by the resort's lagoon-style pool or enjoy alfresco dining at the onsite BBQ area. With the Esplanade right on your doorstep and easy access to the area's main attractions, you're perfectly placed to make the most of your time with family or friends.

title: Central Cairns Family Resort Moments from the Esplanade with Lagoon-Style Pool & Restaurant
description:
Embrace the Cairns tropics with a stay at this hotel located just a stone's throw from the city's vibrant dining scene, where you can indulge in fresh seafood and local delicacies. The resort is also a short stroll from the bustling Cairns Esplanade, renowned for its lively markets and picturesque boardwalk.

The hotel itself boasts a stunning lagoon-style pool, contemporary fitness centre and the relaxed Moku Bar + Grill, serving Pacific island-inspired cuisine.
